commenter_b: The Deplorables, The Unredeamables won the election tonight. The Media, Hollywood, Academia, Celebrities and the Elected Officials on both sides that have tainted and divided our country with their slanted, elitist opinions have finally been put in their place. This election was never about Donald Trump, it was about the people. Not the people the media falsely reported about and stereotyped. I was at two Trump rallies, these people were black, white, Hispanic, all ages and all races. People who love our country, love our constitution and the principles within it, love God and love and respect all Americans. The silent majority who we're sick and tired of being falsely portrayed as the intolerant ones, being intimidated, called names and told by an arrogant and grossly out of control government and out of touch minority what we were supposed to think, say and do. #WeThePeople #IndependenceDay2016
commenter_a: This is about Obama, the establishment and MSM picking Clinton over Bernie. Congrats imbecils.
